H0.text: At what fret are found the same notes as the open strings, but an octave higher, on a standard guitar. 7

H1.text: At what fret are found the same notes as the open strings, but an octave higher, on a standard guitar. 5

H2.text: At what fret are found the same notes as the open strings, but an octave higher, on a standard guitar. 9

H3.text: At what fret are found the same notes as the open strings, but an octave higher, on a standard guitar. 12

A4.text: The twelfth fret should divide the string in two exact halves.

A5.text: To compensate for the increase in string tension when the string is pressed against the frets, the bridge position is adjusted slightly so the 12th fret plays exactly in tune.
